title: Veggie Burgers
steps: In a skillet over medium heat, toast walnuts for 5-7 minutes. Set aside.
Heat half the oil over medium heat in the same skillet. Sauté onion for 4 minutes. Set aside.
Blend cooled walnuts with chili powder, cumin, paprika, salt, black pepper, and brown sugar. Set aside.
Mash cooked black beans to a paste.
Combine cooked brown rice, walnut-spice mixture, sautéed onion, mashed black beans, bread crumbs, and BBQ sauce. Mix well.
Heat the other half of the oil over medium heat in the same skillet. Divide mixture into 5 patties and place on skillet.
Cook 3-4 minutes per side, flipping gently.
